DOC.brief_summary: This study conduct Europe . An observational study evaluate glycaemic control patient use Levemir® initiation insulin therapy treatment type 2 diabetes Slovakia .
DOC.brief_title: Observational Study Glycaemic Control Patients Uncontrolled Oral Antidiabetic Agents Starting With 1 ( Once ) Daily Levemir® ( Insulin Detemir ) Treatment Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus
